author: pbr
title: programming challenge
review:
This sensor tells you which way it's pointed.

That's cool... but think about it, you get a number from 0..360

So, to keep it aimed a particular way, just make sure to turn a little left if it goes a few degrees to far to the right, and turn a little right if it goes a few degrees the other way, right?

Yes, except near "north" or whatever direction it decides to go from 0 to 360 or from 360 to 0.

so this makes coming up with logic that works right for keeping a robot aimed ANY direction a challenge.

Other than that, it rocks.
